A

ApplicationDriver - Class in za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.drivers
This class is the application workhorse; it leverages the various application helpers, libraries and readers to drive the application.
ApplicationDriver(String...) - Constructor for class za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.drivers.ApplicationDriver
Constructs and initialises a new ApplicationDriver object.
ApplicationException - Exception in za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.exceptions
This class provides a base wrapper for resident application exceptions.
ApplicationException(String) - Constructor for exception za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.exceptions.ApplicationException
Constructs and initialises a new ApplicationException instance with the message supplied.
ApplicationException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.exceptions.ApplicationException
Constructs and initialises a new ApplicationException instance with the cause supplied.
ApplicationException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.exceptions.ApplicationException
Constructs and initialises a new ApplicationException instance with the message and cause supplied.
ArgumentReader - Class in za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.readers
This class utilises regular expression pattern matching to perform argument validation whilst reading from a character-input stream.
ArgumentReader(Reader, String, int) - Constructor for class za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.readers.ArgumentReader
Constructs and initialises a new ArgumentReader object with a Reader through which the input will be read, the regular expression against which arguments will be validated and the bitmask Integer flags that augment the patterns matching behaviour.
ArgumentReader(Reader, String) - Constructor for class za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.readers.ArgumentReader
Constructs and initialises a new ArgumentReader object with a Reader through which the input will be read, the regular expression against which arguments will be validated.
avg(int...) - Static method in class za.co.resnick.amazonhomework.libraries.MathLibrary
Returns the average of the values in the Integer [] provided.
